definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: Please contact Concierge for details of Long Distance Car Hire.
sentences.chinese: 長途包車價格請向禮賓部查詢。

sentences.english: The Chief Concierge will assign drivers available at that time for the journey.
sentences.chinese: 禮賓部主管將安排一名當班司機駕車送客人到機場。

sentences.english: Our company is a Concierge in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是一家在美國禮賓部。

sentences.english: "I told you not to leave the boat, " the concierge said, glaring at us.
sentences.chinese: 禮賓員眼睛瞪着我們說，“我告訴過你們不要下船。”

sentences.english: To be responsible for the foreign-related protocol arrangement and administration, and reception for foreign guests.
sentences.chinese: 負責銀監會涉外禮賓安排和管理，接待外賓來訪。

sentences.english: You can pick up your parcel at the concierge .
sentences.chinese: 您可以到禮賓部領取您的包裹。

sentences.english: You may[can] leave your luggage in the Concierge.
sentences.chinese: 您可以把行李放在禮賓部。

sentences.english: I'll send up the concierge , he can arrange a personal shopper for you.
sentences.chinese: 我會讓禮賓部來爲你安排私人導購。

sentences.english: We weren't supposed to leave the boat. That's what the concierge said.
sentences.chinese: 遊船上的禮賓員說我們原本是不能離船的。

sentences.english: Should you need any information or assistance, please call Concierge .
sentences.chinese: 如果您需要任何信息或協助，請打電話到禮賓部。

sentences.english: Quintessentially is one of the world's leading concierge services.
sentences.chinese: 精英會是世界上領先的禮賓服務之一。

sentences.english: Check the cleanliness and tidiness of luggage storage room and concierge service counter.
sentences.chinese: 檢查行李房和禮賓部櫃檯是否乾淨整潔。

sentences.english: I am familiar with the work of Concierge.
sentences.chinese: 我非常熟悉禮賓部的接待工作。

sentences.english: Bell Captain, Concierge, Front Office Manager.
sentences.chinese: 行李領班，禮賓主管，前廳部經理。

sentences.english: Premier zhou concierge working there often stressed.
sentences.chinese: 周總理經常強調禮賓司工作無小事。

sentences.english: Government House has a front lawn and a back garden.
sentences.chinese: 禮賓府前面是一片平整的草坪，後面還有個花園。

definition: Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Neipu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
full-time/to appoint sb to a specific task
Ministry of Foreign Affairs in Qing Dynasty
Wanluan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
